        SELECT
        z.transfer AS transfer, z.hand_over_agecd AS handOverAgeCd, ROUND(SUM(z.hand_over_amount), 2) AS handOverAmount,
        ROUND(SUM(z.cur_amount), 2) AS curAmount
        FROM (

        r.ious, r.transfer, r.hand_over_agecd, r.hand_over_amount, r.cur_amount
